short: I have been a software developer for almost 3 years. I help companies build and improve the performance of their web apps.
long: I have been a software developer for almost 3 years working with JavaScript, Ruby on Rails and React, I help companies build and improve the performance of their web apps. In the last 2 years, I have worked with two companies as a front-end developer to build dashboards that has more than 5000 users and web apps that is accessed by more than 100,000 people. My strength is building beautiful, scalable and performant web apps.
verylong: Long ago in a distant land
